title: Purchasing champion problem
body:
Hello,
I bought the new champion Rakan. My IP disappeared. but he was not purchased. I can see this transfer in history, but I haven't got  him in "owned champions" category. It's be like a haven't bought him. Any ideas about geting back the IP or champ? 

I DIDN'T REFUND HIM!

replies.body: It looks like there was some kind of hiccup with the store. I see that you bought Rakan in your transaction history as well, but it looks like he just wasn't ready to leave Xayah's side. Go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to sweet talk him into joining your team ;).
This happened to me as well with Wukong, just an hour ago...
